Now, let's implement each component one by one. First, I'll enhance the Button component:

---

```diff
- 
+ import React from 'react';
+ import styled, { css } from 'styled-components';
+ import FocusableItem from './FocusableItem';
+ 
+ // Button variants
+ export type ButtonVariant = 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'text' | 'icon' | 'danger';
+ export type ButtonSize = 'small' | 'medium' | 'large';
+ 
+ interface ButtonProps {
+   id: string;
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+   variant?: ButtonVariant;
+   size?: ButtonSize;
+   onClick?: () => void;
+   disabled?: boolean;
+   startIcon?: React.ReactNode;
+   endIcon?: React.ReactNode;
+   fullWidth?: boolean;
+   groupId?: string;
+   className?: string;
+   neighbors?: {
+     up?: string;
+     down?: string;
+     left?: string;
+     right?: string;
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ const getButtonStyles = (variant: ButtonVariant = 'primary', size: ButtonSize = 'medium') => {
+   // Base styles
+   let styles = css`
+     display: inline-flex;
+     align-items: center;
+     justify-content: center;
+     gap: 8px;
+     border: none;
+     border-radius: 6px;
+     font-weight: 500;
+     transition: all 0.2s ease;
+     cursor: pointer;
+     
+     &:disabled {
+       opacity: 0.5;
+       cursor: not-allowed;
+     }
+   `;
+   
+   // Add size styles
+   switch (size) {
+     case 'small':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         padding: 8px 12px;
+         font-size: 14px;
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'medium':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         padding: 12px 20px;
+         font-size: 16px;
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'large':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         padding: 16px 32px;
+         font-size: 18px;
+       `;
+       break;
+   }
+   
+   // Add variant styles
+   switch (variant) {
+     case 'primary':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         background-color: var(--primary-color);
+         color: var(--on-primary-color);
+         
+         &:hover:not(:disabled) {
+           background-color: var(--primary-color-hover);
+           transform: translateY(-2px);
+         }
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'secondary':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         background-color: var(--surface-color);
+         color: var(--on-surface-color);
+         border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
+         
+         &:hover:not(:disabled) {
+           background-color: var(--surface-hover-color);
+         }
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'text':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         background-color: transparent;
+         color: var(--primary-color);
+         padding-left: 8px;
+         padding-right: 8px;
+         
+         &:hover:not(:disabled) {
+           background-color: rgba(187, 134, 252, 0.1);
+         }
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'icon':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         background-color: transparent;
+         color: var(--on-surface-color);
+         padding: ${size === 'small' ? '6px' : size === 'medium' ? '10px' : '14px'};
+         border-radius: 50%;
+         
+         &:hover:not(:disabled) {
+           background-color: var(--surface-hover-color);
+         }
+       `;
+       break;
+     case 'danger':
+       styles = css`
+         ${styles}
+         background-color: var(--error-color, #f44336);
+         color: white;
+         
+         &:hover:not(:disabled) {
+           background-color: var(--error-color-hover, #d32f2f);
+         }
+       `;
+       break;
+   }
+   
+   return styles;
+ };
+ 
+ const StyledButton = styled.button<{
+   variant: ButtonVariant;
+   size: ButtonSize;
+   fullWidth?: boolean;
+   isFocused: boolean;
+ }>`
+   ${props => getButtonStyles(props.variant, props.size)}
+   
+   width: ${props => props.fullWidth ? '100%' : 'auto'};
+   
+   /* Focus styles */
+   ${props => props.isFocused && css`
+     ${props.variant !== 'text' && props.variant !== 'icon' && css`
+       box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px 
+         ${props.variant === 'primary' 
+           ? 'rgba(187, 134, 252, 0.4)' 
+           : props.variant === 'danger' 
+             ? 'rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.4)' 
+             : 'rgba(187, 134, 252, 0.3)'
+         };
+     `}
+     
+     /* Scale effect when focused */
+     transform: scale(1.05);
+     
+     /* Text buttons just get underline and background */
+     ${props.variant === 'text' && css`
+       text-decoration: underline;
+       background-color: rgba(187, 134, 252, 0.1);
+     `}
+     
+     /* Icon buttons just get a background */
+     ${props.variant === 'icon' && css`
+       background-color: var(--surface-hover-color);
+     `}
+   `}
+ `;
+ 
+ // Button Group Component
+ const ButtonGroupContainer = styled.div<{
+   gap?: number;
+   vertical?: boolean;
+ }>`
+   display: flex;
+   flex-direction: ${props => props.vertical ? 'column' : 'row'};
+   gap: ${props => props.gap || 8}px;
+   align-items: ${props => props.vertical ? 'stretch' : 'center'};
+ `;
+ 
+ export interface ButtonGroupProps {
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+   gap?: number;
+   vertical?: boolean;
+   groupId: string;
+   className?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export const ButtonGroup: React.FC<ButtonGroupProps> = ({ 
+   children, 
+   gap,
+   vertical = false,
+   groupId,
+   className
+ }) => {
+   return (
+     <ButtonGroupContainer 
+       gap={gap} 
+       vertical={vertical}
+       className={className}
+       data-group-id={groupId}
+     >
+       {React.Children.map(children, (child) => {
+         if (React.isValidElement(child)) {
+           return React.cloneElement(child, {
+             ...child.props,
+             groupId: groupId,
+           });
+         }
+         return child;
+       })}
+     </ButtonGroupContainer>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ const Button: React.FC<ButtonProps> = ({
+   id,
+   children,
+   variant = 'primary',
+   size = 'medium',
+   onClick,
+   disabled = false,
+   startIcon,
+   endIcon,
+   fullWidth = false,
+   groupId,
+   className,
+   neighbors
+ }) => {
+   const handleClick = () => {
+     if (!disabled && onClick) {
+       onClick();
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <FocusableItem
+       id={id}
+       onClick={handleClick}
+       disabled={disabled}
+       className={className}
+       neighbors={neighbors}
+       groupId={groupId}
+       indicatorScale={1.05}
+       noIndicator
+     >
+       {({ isFocused }) => (
+         <StyledButton
+           variant={variant}
+           size={size}
+           fullWidth={fullWidth}
+           isFocused={isFocused}
+           disabled={disabled}
+           type="button"
+         >
+           {startIcon && <span className="button-start-icon">{startIcon}</span>}
+           {children}
+           {endIcon && <span className="button-end-icon">{endIcon}</span>}
+         </StyledButton>
+       )}
+     </FocusableItem>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Button; 
```

```diff
    );
```

Let's simplify the ButtonGroup component to avoid the TypeScript error:

---

```diff
        data-group-id={groupId}
```

Now, let's implement the Carousel component:

---



---



---



---



---
